attributes.action: No Confidence in Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn
attributes.additional_details: Both are ignoring their party manifestos and are treating the 17.4 million who voted for Brexit with contempt. We call on them both to stand aside and make way for leaders who have the ability to deliver the Brexit the nation voted for.
attributes.background: We the undersigned have no confidence in Prime Minister, Theresa May or Leader of the Opposition, Jeremy Corbyn.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for people to be given or to lose jobs. This includes calling for votes of no confidence.
